source:
TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_SEQ_00Uin Nee would never dream of imposing upon their favorite mortal.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe
Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe ou le job qui a servi à la commencer.

Uin Nee aimerait rassurer les enfants inquiets.

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_TODO_00<tab>Survey the area northwest of Sextuplet Shallow and slay a moss fungus for its cap.
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_TODO_00<tab>Observer les environs à l'endroit indiqué au nord-ouest du bas-fond des Sextuplés et vaincre une mycose moisie tueuse pour obtenir son chapeau

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the moss fungus cap to Uin Nee.
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_TODO_01<tab>Apporter le chapeau de mycose moisie à Uin Nee

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_000<tab>You know, sometimes I feel guilty about always asking you to run to and fro performing errands for me. But don't worry─I'm not going to do anything like that today! Today, I'm going to tell you a story. A story of moss fungus, and of children.
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_000<tab>J'ai entendu une histoire qui fait froid dans le dos... Tu savais que sur l'île de Kholusia, des mycoses moisies poussent sur les tombes<var 1D /var>? Imagine-les en train de se mettre à gigoter... Brrr, qu'est-ce que c'est sinistre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Moss fungus often grows on graves, and because of this, Kholusians believe it to be a most baleful thing, and a harbinger of death, disease, and all sort of other nasty things. Because of this, many children have nightmares of being chased after by giant moss funguses! Is it moss funguses?
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Tu vas me dire que ça n'a pas grand-chose à voir avec le Lyhe Mheg. C'est vrai, mais tu as pensé aux pauvres enfants qui en ont entendu parler et font des cauchemars toutes les nuits<var 1D /var>? Il faut que ça cesse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Anyhow, this got me thinking. Wouldn't it be <var 1A 02 /var>so<var 1A 01 /var> sweet if <var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> put these poor dreamers' hearts at ease by bringing me the cap of a slain moss fungus, that I could spin it into a dream to show the children that there's nothing to fear about these funny-looking creatures?
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, j'ai un plan. En intégrant à leurs rêves la preuve qu'une de ces immondes créatures a été terrassée, ils sauraient qu'ils risquent pas de se faire attaquer et ils seraient rassurés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_003<tab>I'm not asking you to do this. Heavens no! I'm merely saying that <var 1A 02 /var>if<var 1A 01 /var> someone were inclined to perform this kind gesture, all they would need to do is take an oh-so-short trip to Sextuplet Shallow and rip the cap off one of the unsuspecting moss funguseses that live there. Don't worry, though─I'm sure my dreamers won't mind living in abject fear for another day or two.
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_003<tab>Voilà ce que tu vas faire. Au nord-ouest du bas-fond des Sextuplés, il y a des mycoses moisies tueuses, les plus effrayantes. Abats-en une, apporte-moi son chapeau et je me chargerai du reste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_010<tab>Hm? You have something for me? But I didn't even ask you for anything!
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_010<tab>Laisse-moi deviner... La chasse au champignon a été bonne<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_011<tab>The cap of a moss fungus! However did you know that I was looking for one of these? It's almost as if you had the power to enter <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> mind! But whatever can I do to reward your selfless and entirely self-motivated gesture?
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_011<tab>Youpi<var 1D /var>!♪ Grâce à toi, les enfants seront rassurés et leurs affreux cauchemars deviendront des songes merveilleux<var 1D /var>! Mais avant ça, j'ai une autre histoire à te raconter sur les mycoses moisies.

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_012<tab>I know, I'll tell you another story about moss fungus! Once upon a time in a mortal kingdom that is no more, people would sometimes play little tricks on those they didn't like by sneaking a teensy-weensy bit of moss fungus poison into their drinks every day.
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_012<tab>Il paraît qu'autrefois, il y avait un vilain tour en vogue chez les humains qui consistait à faire boire chaque jour une petite quantité d'un poison fabriqué à partir des spores de ces champignons.

source: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_013<tab>Guess what would happen then? The poor person would gradually grow sick and eventually die, and nobody would be the wiser! That's quite the trick, don't you think? Why, I wish I'd thought of it myself! By the way, can I interest you in a sip of water before you go? Tee hee!
target: TEXT_BANPIX109_03697_UINNEE_000_013<tab>La personne qui en avait bu finissait par mourir, sans que personne sache pourquoi<var 1D /var>! Une façon imparable de se débarrasser de ses ennemis sans éveiller les soupçons... Décidément, vous autres avez parfois l'esprit mal tourné<var 1D /var>!
